scenario_text.value: I... Why... Why am I...
Shuu...ji...

Wha’—Lopmon?! Are you okay?! I’m sorry, this
is all my fault...!

Shuuji...was I...of some use to you,
Shuuji...?

What, you... How could you ask that, after
what I did to you...?
Shuuji...

...I’m so, so sorry, Lopmon. I’m the one
who’s been useless here.

I kept seeing myself in you—all the weakness
I saw in myself. It was so painful.

But you’re so much stronger than I’ve ever
been. You came to save me, after everything.

Ah... I’m so happy... You praised me,
Shuuji...

Lopmon... I wanted to, for so, so long. But
that doesn’t matter anymore.

I want to protect everyone...to save them.
I... I want to live up to your expectations!

I want to be someone you can be proud of!
Someone to reward all your efforts!
Not for praise, but to live without regret...
Lend me your strength, Lopmon!
Haaugh! Ah, unnngh... Auuugh!

Lopmon?! Hold on, Lopmon! I... I have to heal
you!
It’s okay, Shuuji... Look!
Lopmon, evolve...!
Turuiemon!!!

Shuuji, your powerful feelings helped me
evolve into Turuiemon!
Turuiemon...!

Now let’s do this, Shuuji! I’ll show you the
strength you gave me!

Now it’s our turn, Agumon.
We need more power if we’re gonna face this!

The desire to save, to protect...
Their thoughts overlap, turning into power.

Yeah, I feel it...
The strong emotions you feel towards them!

We’ll send our rage at that bastard that
toyed with Shuuji’s heart!!!

Go on! Hurry up and evolve! Show
them we’re not useless!

Stop, Shuuji... It hurts, and I’m scared.
I don’t like this!

I’m the one in pain! I’m the one who’s
scared! All because you can’t evolve!

Yeah, everything is your fault! You’re the
reason they called me useless!
Hey, what’s with this black fog?!
That’s bad news!
Bad news? What do you mean?!

I dunno, it’s just... I can tell it’s bad!
Don’t do it, Lopmon!!!
...GRRRAAAAAAAAAAAAH!!!

(This bad feeling... Yeah, I get it too. It
isn’t the feeling of dependable strength.)
(Those senseless eyes. That moaning...)
(Is he going berserk?!)

You did it... I knew you could if you tried!
Now show them. Show them I’m not useless!

He transformed! Is that another evolution,
Dracumon?

That’s...Wendimon?! Get away, Kaito! That
thing’s trouble!

Lopmon probably turned into that as
a reaction to Shuuji’s rage!

This is bad! Our words aren’t getting through
to him!!!

Jeez, he took down such a huge enemy with
a single blow?!

Ha ha ha ha haaa! Yes, that’s the way! Crush
all the villains looking down on me!
Oh, no! Run away!!!

...Huh? Why’re you coming over here? Whoa,
stop! It’s me, don’t you recognize me?!
STOP!!! WAAAAAAAAAAAAUGH!!!
It...
It ate Shuuji?!

I don’t believe it...
This can’t be happening!
Ho ho ho ho...! Dinner is served!

That’s all she wrote for this one. Well
then! You’re next. Come turn into vessels!
GRRRRRR...!

THROAT HURTS... IT HUUUUUURTS...!
NNNGH... HNNNGH... HELLLP...ME...!
DESTROY... DESTROY...ALL... GRAAAAAAGH!!!
Oh no! Now it’s looking at us!

(The rest of us are in danger at this rate!
But can we really fight? Against Lopmon...?)

(No, there’s no time to worry about that! All
we can do now is protect ourselves!)
We have to fight! Let’s go, everyone!
